Name: Galactis
About the game: Revive the glory of bygone space shooter arcade days in Galactis! FEATURES: -Single player space shooter emphazised in one-on-one battles. -Choose from three spaceships, each with unique characteristics and weaponry. -Spend credits to upgrade your ship's weapons, shields, armor, speed and install modules. -Good reflexes are critical to survive each fight. Having good equipments helps too! -Ammunition is a valuable resource; time your attacks wisely to minimize waste. -Difficulty escalates as each boss is defeated, providing greater challenge.
Meta Title: Galactis: Aug 6, 2018, Gustavo Contreras and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Galactis? Check out the release date (Aug 6, 2018), developer insights from Gustavo Contreras, and a complete game summary.
